item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Micha≈Ç, a.k.a. Nebelgrau. Self-described as an “aspiring data witcher, wannabe embedded Rustacean, Pythonista and TinyML afficionado” :) Let me unpack all that! Somewhere towards the end of 2017 I decided to learn something about data science, so I found out about Python. I was curious about electronics, too, and thought this would help me learn programming in general, so I also started tinkering with MicroPython on Espressif and STM32 devices.
